title: Docs - Google Cloud 架構框架：產品可靠性指南
abstract:
# Docs - Google Cloud 架構框架：產品可靠性指南
Last reviewed 2023-07-18 UTC
架構框架中的這一部分提供特定於產品的最佳實踐指導，用於確保某些 Google Cloud 產品的可靠性、可用性和一致性。這些指南還提供了相關建議，以最大限度減少故障和從故障中恢復，以及在負載下實現良好的應用擴縮。
**注意** ：如需瞭解 Google Cloud 中平臺級別的可靠性組件（可用區、區域和位置級資源）及其提供的可用性級別，請參閱 [Google Cloud 基礎架構可靠性指南](https://cloud.google.com/architecture/infra-reliability-guide?hl=zh-cn) 。本指南還提供了評估工作負載可靠性要求的指南，並提供了在 Google Cloud 中構建和管理可靠基礎架構的架構建議。
產品可靠性指南按以下領域分類：
- 計算- [Compute Engine](https://cloud.google.com/architecture/framework/reliability/product-guides/compute?hl=zh-cn) 
- [Cloud Run](https://cloud.google.com/architecture/framework/reliability/product-guides/run?hl=zh-cn) 
- [Cloud Functions ](https://cloud.google.com/architecture/framework/reliability/product-guides/functions?hl=zh-cn) 
- [Google Kubernetes Engine ](https://cloud.google.com/architecture/framework/reliability/product-guides/kubernetes-engine?hl=zh-cn) 
- 存儲和數據庫
- [Cloud Storage](https://cloud.google.com/architecture/framework/reliability/product-guides/storage?hl=zh-cn) 
- [Firestore](https://cloud.google.com/architecture/framework/reliability/product-guides/firestore?hl=zh-cn) 
- [Bigtable](https://cloud.google.com/architecture/framework/reliability/product-guides/bigtable?hl=zh-cn) 
- [Cloud SQL](https://cloud.google.com/architecture/framework/reliability/product-guides/sql?hl=zh-cn) 
- [Spanner](https://cloud.google.com/architecture/framework/reliability/product-guides/spanner?hl=zh-cn) 
- [Filestore](https://cloud.google.com/architecture/framework/reliability/product-guides/filestore?hl=zh-cn) 
- [Memorystore](https://cloud.google.com/architecture/framework/reliability/product-guides/memorystore?hl=zh-cn) 
- 網絡- [Cloud DNS](https://cloud.google.com/architecture/framework/reliability/product-guides/dns?hl=zh-cn) 
- [Cloud Load Balancing](https://cloud.google.com/architecture/framework/reliability/product-guides/load-balancing?hl=zh-cn) 
- [Cloud CDN](https://cloud.google.com/architecture/framework/reliability/product-guides/cdn?hl=zh-cn) 
- 數據分析
- [BigQuery](https://cloud.google.com/architecture/framework/reliability/product-guides/bigquery?hl=zh-cn) 
- [Dataflow](https://cloud.google.com/architecture/framework/reliability/product-guides/dataflow?hl=zh-cn) 
- [Dataproc](https://cloud.google.com/architecture/framework/reliability/product-guides/dataproc?hl=zh-cn
